content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=53.0, y=-83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=53.0, y=-83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=52.5, y=-84.5)

### Copper Ore Mining and Transport System at Position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-25.0, y=-64.0) connected to a series of Transport Belts at positions (x=-25.5, y=-65.5), (x=-24.5, y=-65.5), and (x=-23.5, y=-65.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-14.0, y=-53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-20.5, y=-65.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=-21.5, y=-65.5) and a Stone Furnace at position (x=-19.0, y=-65.0)

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=0.0, y=0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=0.0, y=0.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (x=1.5, y=0.5) and a Burner Inserter at position (x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Belt Transport System
Consists of the following belt groups:
- BeltGroup at positions (x=-26.5, y=-65.5) to (x=-22.5, y=-65.5)
- BeltGroup at positions (x=-23.5, y=-64.5) to (x=-21.5, y=-64.5)
- BeltGroup at positions (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-17.5, y=-59.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when attempting to get an entity at a non-existent position
- Verify the position of the entity before attempting to retrieve it to ensure it exists at the specified location
